mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.pid AS "p.id", a.no AS "no", a.ck_id AS "ck.id", a.hw_id AS "hw.id", a.cinvcode AS "cinvcode", a.cinvname AS "cinvname", a.cinvstd AS "cinvstd", a.batchno AS "batchno", a.scdate AS "scdate", a.num AS "num", a.unit AS "unit", a.cordercode AS "cordercode", a.irowno AS "irowno", a.customer AS "customer.id", a.dept AS "dept.id", ck.name AS "ck.name", ck.usehw as "ck.usehw", hw.name AS "hw.name"
LEFT JOIN business_dispatch b ON b.id = a.pid LEFT JOIN base_cangku ck ON ck.id = a.ck_id LEFT JOIN base_huowei hw ON hw.id = a.hw_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_dispatch_mx( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, pid, no, ck_id, hw_id, cinvcode, cinvname, cinvstd, batchno, scdate, num, unit, cordercode, irowno, customer, dept ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{p.id}, #{no}, #{ck.id}, #{hw.id}, #{cinvcode}, #{cinvname}, #{cinvstd}, #{batchno}, #{scdate}, #{num}, #{unit}, #{cordercode}, #{irowno}, #{customer.id}, #{dept.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE business_dispatch_mx SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, pid = #{p.id}, no = #{no}, ck_id = #{ck.id}, hw_id = #{hw.id}, cinvcode = #{cinvcode}, cinvname = #{cinvname}, cinvstd = #{cinvstd}, batchno = #{batchno}, scdate = #{scdate}, num = #{num}, unit = #{unit}, cordercode = #{cordercode}, irowno = #{irowno}, customer = #{customer.id}, dept = #{dept.id} WHERE id = #{id}
